item.title: High Quality Call Termination With SIP Trunking
item.description:
Prioritizing voice packets on a network ensures high-quality VoIP calls within an organization. However, connecting to the outside world poses a challenge due to the incompatibility between modern packet-switched networks and the traditional circuit-switched phone system. To bridge this gap, organizations can either manage the conversion internally or outsource it to a third-party provider through SIP trunking. SIP trunking offers a potentially cost-effective solution by consolidating multiple phone lines into a single “trunk” line and utilizing the Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) for call switching...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/high-quality-call-termination-with-sip-trunking/
